description: T1 (Ash, Category C) - fell to ground and remove.T2 (Magnolia, Category C) - fell to ground and remove.T3 (Crab Apple, Category C) - fell to ground and remove.T4 (Poplar, Category C) - fell to ground and remove.T5 (Crab Apple, Category C) - fell to ground and remove.T6 (Crab Apple, Category C) - fell to ground and remove.T9 (Sycamore, Category B) - prune by circa 0.5 metres.T10 (London Pine, Category A) - prune small diameter of branches by 1.5 - 2 metres.T11 (Lime Tree, Category A) - prune small diameter of branches by 2 - 2.5 metres.T17 (Norway Maple, Category C) - prune small diameter of branches by circa 2 metres.T18 (Norway Maple, Category C) - prune small diameter of branches by circa 2 metres.T19 (Norway Maple, Category C) - prune small diameter of branches by circa 2 metres.T25 (Horse Chestnut, Category A) - prune small diameter of branches by circa 0.5 metres.T26 (Lime, Category A) - prune small diameter of branches by circa 0.5 metres.T27 (Hawthorn, Category U) - fell to ground and remove.T28 (Poplar, Category B) - prune western aspect of tree by circa 3 metres.T34 (Cherry, Category C) - prune south eastern aspect of tree by circa 1 metre.T37 (Norway Spruce, Category B) - removal of some branches to allow for clearance.
decision_conditions: This consent is valid for 2 YEARS ONLY.
All tree works shall be carried out in accordance with BS3998:2010 and in line with current Aboricultural best practice.

Replacement Tree(s) of heavy standard size, shall be planted in the first growing season following the agreed tree removal on this notice. The species type and exact location of planting shall be agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority (by a formal discharge of condition application) prior to the agreed tree removal on this notice.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: TPOA Tree Preservation Order 456 - Clapham Park Estate
